import React from "react" import { Link,NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../../Context/auth" import toast from "react-hot-toast" const Header = () => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth() const handleLogout = () =>{ setAuth({ ...auth, user:null, token:"" }) localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successful") } return( <>
:🛒 Ecommerce App
  • HOME
  • CATEGORY
    • { !auth.user ? (<>
  • REGISTER
  • LOGIN
    • ) : (<>
  • {auth?.user?.name}
    • Dashboard
    • Logout
    • ) }
  • CART(0)
) } export default Header
